page.title: 16Education (cont)
page.content:
Fourfield Primary School: ------------------------ Fourfields School opened in 1979 and serves the areas north the Broadway and the families who live in Broadway. It is a co_educational primary school providing a broad_based education for children aged 4 to 11 years. The School is of semi_open plan design and its facilities include a sports field, play area,conservation area , dining room/hall,kiln room,children's cooking area, an audio visual room and facilities for art and craft.
Parental involvment is very important and teachers,parents,friends and children work together to arrange regular social and education events, and have thus helped to create a school which is part of a caring community.
